verbs.description: [ARG0: Journey keyboardist Jonathan Cain] [V: met] [ARG1: controversial pastor Paula White] [ARGM-MNR: by chance] . Now the rock star applauds his wife 's role as chaplain to President Trump .
Journey keyboardist Jonathan Cain met controversial pastor Paula White by chance . [ARGM-TMP: Now] [ARG0: the rock star] [V: applauds] [ARG1: his wife 's role as chaplain to President Trump] .
